exceptions.summary:
Thrown when the schema is not an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.ArraySchema" /> or the resolution is not an
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ArrayResolution" />.

Thrown when the resolved type is neither an array type nor a type assignable from
            <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" />.
